entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries and ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:38 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:38 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
